alert.note: Alert for Clark; Kiowa; Pratt; Stafford (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued January 08 at 6:43PM CST until January 09 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Stafford, Kiowa, Pratt and Clark Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are expected due to blowing and drifting snow. Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winter driving conditions will spread rapidly and abruptly eastward late Monday afternoon into Monday night. Conditions will change quickly over short times and distances, and motorists are urged to be prepared for the onset of dangerous travel.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
